m: the boy goes on to elaborate.

​ Prior to waking up in this place.... living life day by day with nothing happening. I've prayed and fought to be noticed by everyone. I prayed to be noticed by my parents. I looked forward to the time I could say that I lived a good life and that I made wonderful memories with those that I grew to have a crazy adventure with. Even if I can't remember my friends now, and I know that I've must to hurt a lot people by ending up here... I can say wholeheartedly that I still look forward to the future.

Even if Yasei isn't here. I will continue to be a knight for the future.
Even if Hikari isn't here. I will continue to be a light for the future.
Even if.....I can't remember my friends. I will smile for them and protect them...to ensure that they have a future.

I.....may not have been able to fight against you, but.....it's because who am I to take your future....and who would you be to take mine. ​
... listens to the players quietly... and smiles a bit.

: ​ I am Yoshida Judai... not Tendie. I don't need to wear masks to achieve my goals... I should be who I am because I know that people love me now... So I want to carry on our moments together... in the future. That is my hope. ​
